description:
This course is for people who wish to learn about all the tax breaks and allowances accountants use (or should use) with their clients to reduce their overall tax liabilities in the UK.

There are over 90 different tax ideas and strategies discussed in this course; grouped into appropriate categories. Each tax break or allowance has it's own video so you can easily navigate and refer back to it in future.

The basics of each tax strategy is explained, by me, in person and if you need further explanation or elaboration then I am happy to answer all your questions in the community forum.

All the tax breaks and allowances are correct for the 2015/16 tax year and so apply for all UK tax returns due until 31st January 2017. I shall update the videos as and when new legislation comes into force.
title: How To Pay Less Tax (UK version)
